sources.title: Copper Mountain (1983) Jim Carrey & Alan Thicke Hit the Powder
sources.description:
Two friends travel to a ski resort, with one looking to hit the slopes, while the other spends time trying to pick up women

Original title: Copper Mountain: A Club Med Experience
Alternative title: Copper Mountain

Director: David Mitchell
Writers: Damian Lee, David Mitchell

Main cast:
Jim Carrey - Bobby Todd
Alan Thicke - Jackson Reach
Richard Gautier - Sonny Silverton
Ziggy Lorenc - Michelle
Jean-Claude Killy - Himself

Musical Performances:
Rita Coolidge 
Ronnie Hawkins 
Bill Champlin
Tamara Champlin
Steve Sexton
Mike Utley

Genres: Comedy, Musical
Release date: July 7, 1983
Filming location: Copper Mountain, Colorado, USA


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Two friends travel to a ski resort, with one looking to hit the slopes, while the other spends time trying to pick up women.
